thread.section_title: TPO Mobile Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TPO Mobile | store.tpo.com
thread.title: Glenn H.
thread.title_full: TPO Mobile reviewed by Glenn H.

author: Glenn H.
title: Glenn H.
text: I've had TPO Mobile for about 3 months and have no real complaints. There's been a couple of glitches where my Data didn't seem to be working but once I was in a different area, all was fine. This has happened on a couple of occasions. But other than that everything has been good. I've had a couple of dropped calls but was it TPO or was it the other parties carrier? For what I use the service for, it suits me just fine. Can't beat the price and the 50% off the first month bill (promo), what a deal. I recommended this service to a friend and he got 75% off the first month bill as part of their Christmas promo.
